awiwahaka kanthawan bihi karana mahamanga dama yana yuddhayen ahimi wu samiya nisa gabgath birindange daruwan wenuwen mema wadapiliwela sakas weyi.mema wada piliwela kriyathmaka kirima sambandha mulika sakachchawa pereda (10) amathyanshaye di pawathwini.me sambandhayen adahas dakwu amathyansha lekam sumithra rahubaddha mahathmiya uthure atharaman wana daruwan aarakshakara ganime wadapiliwelata eksath jathinge janagahana aramudala, eksath jathinge sanwardhana aramudala, eksath jathinge lama aramudala, sewda childran sanwidhanaya, saukhya amathyanshaya saha shri lanka pawul sanwidhana karyanshayeda dayakathwaya laba ganimata kriyakarana bawa sumithra rahubaddha mahathmiya kiwaya.thaman bihikarana daruwa upan geyima mara nodama ho maha manga dama nogos amathyanshaye surakum madhyasthanayata yomu karawiya yuthu bawa lekamwariya kiyayi.ee sandaha pradeshaye palliya, kowila, athulu pujaniya sthanawala sahayogaya laba ganimata apeksha karayi.me sandaha sahayogaya laba ganimata aayathana samanga uthuru palathe disthrik lekamwarun pradeshiya lekamwarun saha polisiya samangada labana 8 wenida sakachchawak pawathwanu atha..
